articles.title: French AI Lab Kyutai Releases OpenAI GPT-4o Killer 'Moshi' - AIM
articles.description: Kyutai, a French non-profit AI research laboratory, has introduced Moshi, a real-time native multimodal foundational AI model. This open-source project features voice-enabled AI assistant offering capabilities that rival OpenAI’s GPT-4o and Google Astra.
